description: Try our easy to follow Lemon, Mint & Chicken Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lemon, Mint & Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, finely grated rind and juice
4 skinless chicken breast fillets, each cut into 8 pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the yogurt, lemon rind and juice, mint and olive oil. Add the chicken pieces and stir well to coat.

Thread the chicken on to 4 skewers and place on a foil-lined grill pan. Cook under a preheated hot grill for about 10 minutes, turning occasionally, or until the chicken is cooked and slightly charred at the edges. Slide the chicken off the skewers and serve in warm pitta breads with slices of cucumber and radish.
